text: Ann Mara (June 18, 1929 â€“ February 1, 2015) was an American businesswoman, socialite, and philanthropist. She was the widow of Wellington Mara, and the matriarch of the Mara family, which includes New York Giants CEO John Mara, and her granddaughters, actresses Rooney Mara and Kate Mara. Mara died from pneumonia and from complications of a fall on February 1, 2015 in Rye, New York, aged 85. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Philanthropists from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Accidental deaths in New York (state) Category:American socialites Category:People from Rye, New York Category:New York Giants Category:People from Manhattan
title: Ann Mara
